languages.text: "Путь Астартес ведет в клыки ужаса. Со всякой выносимой разумом угрозой могут справиться смертные. Мы же нужны там, где начинается немыслимое. То, с пониманием чего невозможно смириться. То, взглянув на что, разум плавится и бьется в конвульсиях".

"The path of an Astartes leads into the fangs of horror. Any threat that can be endured by the mind is one that mortals can handle. But we are needed where the unthinkable begins to happen. Things that understanding cannot help to bear. Things that, once beheld, turn minds into bubbling, pulsating dreck."
languages.original_text: "Путь Астартес ведет в клыки ужаса. Со всякой выносимой разумом угрозой могут справиться смертные. Мы же нужны там, где начинается немыслимое. То, с пониманием чего невозможно смириться. То, взглянув на что, разум плавится и бьется в конвульсиях".

But we are needed where the unthinkable begins to happen. Things that understanding cannot help to bear. Things that, once beheld, turn minds to bubbling, pulsating dreck."

Things that understanding cannot help to bear. Things that, once beheld, turn minds to bubbling, pulsating dreck."

Things that understanding cannot help to bear. Things that, once beheld, turn minds to bubbling, pulsating dreck."

Things that understanding cannot help to bear. Things that, once beheld, turn minds to bubbling, pulsating dreck."

languages.text: “阿斯塔特修士的道路通往恐怖的獠牙。只要是头脑可以忍受的威胁，普通人都可以应对。然而，若是无法想象的恐怖袭来，就轮到我们出马了。那样的恐怖，靠头脑与理智根本无法应付。一旦看到这样的景象，凡人的思想只会变成一堆冒着泡的泔水。”
languages.original_text: "The path of an Astartes leads into the fangs of horror. Any threat that can be endured by the mind is one that mortals can handle. But we are needed where the unthinkable begins to happen. Things that understanding cannot help to bear. Things that, once beheld, turn minds into bubbling, pulsating dreck."

traits.locale_text: “阿斯塔特修士的道路通往恐怖的獠牙。只要是头脑可以忍受的威胁，普通人都可以应对。然而，若是无法想象的恐怖袭来，就轮到我们出马了。那样的恐怖，靠头脑与理智根本无法应付。一旦看到这样的景象，凡人的思想只会变成一堆冒着泡的泔水。”

languages.text: «El camino de un Astartes conduce a los colmillos del terror. Cualquier amenaza que la mente puede resistir es algo que los mortales pueden resolver. Nosotros hacemos falta donde lo impensable sucede. Para cosas que la comprensión no puede soportar. Cosas que, una vez vistas, convierten la mente en lodo babeante y palpitante».
languages.original_text: "The path of an Astartes leads into the fangs of horror. Any threat that can be endured by the mind is one that mortals can handle. But we are needed where the unthinkable begins to happen. Things that understanding cannot help to bear. Things that, once beheld, turn minds into bubbling, pulsating dreck."

traits.locale_text: «El camino de un Astartes conduce a los colmillos del terror. Cualquier amenaza que la mente puede resistir es algo que los mortales pueden resolver. Nosotros hacemos falta donde lo impensable sucede. Para cosas que la comprensión no puede soportar. Cosas que, una vez vistas, convierten la mente en lodo babeante y palpitante».

languages.text: 「アスタルテスの道は恐怖の牙へと続く。精神で耐えられる脅威なら、人間でも対処できる。しかし、俺達は想像を絶することが起こりえる場所でこそ必要とされるのさ。理解ではどうすることもできないことが起こる場所でな。ひとたび目にすれば、心は泡立ち、脈打つ骸と化す、そういうものと対峙する中で」
languages.original_text: "The path of an Astartes leads into the fangs of horror. Any threat that can be endured by the mind is one that mortals can handle. But we are needed where the unthinkable begins to happen. Things that understanding cannot help to bear. Things that, once beheld, turn minds into bubbling, pulsating dreck."

traits.locale_text: 「アスタルテスの道は恐怖の牙へと続く。精神で耐えられる脅威なら、人間でも対処できる。しかし、俺達は想像を絶することが起こりえる場所でこそ必要とされるのさ。理解ではどうすることもできないことが起こる場所でな。ひとたび目にすれば、心は泡立ち、脈打つ骸と化す、そういうものと対峙する中で」

languages.text: "Der Pfad eines Astartes führt in die Zähne des Grauens. Jede Gefahr, die der Verstand ertragen kann, können auch Sterbliche überstehen. Doch wir werden dort benötigt, wo das Undenkbare zu geschehen beginnt. Dinge, die das Verständnis nicht ertragen kann. Dinge, die den Verstand in blubbernden, köchelnden Schleim verwandeln."
languages.original_text: "The path of an Astartes leads into the fangs of horror. Any threat that can be endured by the mind is one that mortals can handle. But we are needed where the unthinkable begins to happen. Things that understanding cannot help to bear. Things that, once beheld, turn minds into bubbling, pulsating dreck."

traits.locale_text: "Der Pfad eines Astartes führt in die Zähne des Grauens. Jede Gefahr, die der Verstand ertragen kann, können auch Sterbliche überstehen. Doch wir werden dort benötigt, wo das Undenkbare zu geschehen beginnt. Dinge, die das Verständnis nicht ertragen kann. Dinge, die den Verstand in blubbernden, köchelnden Schleim verwandeln."

languages.text: « Le chemin de l'Astartes le conduit dans les crocs de l'horreur. Les mortels sont capables de repousser toute menace pouvant être endurée par l'esprit. Mais nous intervenons lorsque l'impensable commence à se produire. Des choses que la raison ne saurait supporter. Des choses qui, une fois contemplées, transforment l'esprit en une bouillie effervescente. »
languages.original_text: "The path of an Astartes leads into the fangs of horror. Any threat that can be endured by the mind is one that mortals can handle. But we are needed where the unthinkable begins to happen. Things that understanding cannot help to bear. Things that, once beheld, turn minds into bubbling, pulsating dreck."

traits.locale_text: « Le chemin de l'Astartes le conduit dans les crocs de l'horreur. Les mortels sont capables de repousser toute menace pouvant être endurée par l'esprit. Mais nous intervenons lorsque l'impensable commence à se produire. Des choses que la raison ne saurait supporter. Des choses qui, une fois contemplées, transforment l'esprit en une bouillie effervescente. »

languages.original_text: "The path of an Astartes leads into the fangs of horror. Any threat that can be endured by the mind is one that mortals can handle. But we are needed where the unthinkable begins to happen. Things that understanding cannot help to bear. Things that, once beheld, turn minds to bubbling, pulsating dreck."

languages.text: "Astartes yolu, dehşetin sivri dişlerine çıkar. Zihnin dayanabildiği tüm tehditler fânilerin kaldırabileceği seviyededir. Fakat bizlere aklın almadığı şeylerin yaşandığı yerlerde, anlamanın direnebilmeye yetmediği şeylerde ihtiyaç vardır. Bir kez görüldüğünde zihni fokur fokur kaynayan çamura çeviren şeylerde."
languages.original_text: "The path of an Astartes leads into the fangs of horror. Any threat that can be endured by the mind is one that mortals can handle. But we are needed where the unthinkable begins to happen. Things that understanding cannot help to bear. Things that, once beheld, turn minds into bubbling, pulsating dreck."

traits.locale_text: "Astartes yolu, korkunun dişlerine çıkar. Zihnin dayanabildiği tüm tehlikeler fânilerin kaldırabileceği seviyededir. Fakat bizlere, aklın almadığı şeylerin yaşandığı yerlerde ihtiyaç vardır. Mantığın kabul etmediği, görüldüğünde zihni köpüren bir çamura dönüştüren şeylerin."
